title: How to Make Chocolate Popsicles

steps.headline: Combine all of the ingredients in a large bowl.
steps.description: Combine the package of instant chocolate pudding mix with the milk and white sugar in a large bowl. Mix with a wire whisk until you achieve a smooth consistency.

steps.headline: Pour into popsicle molds.
steps.description: Pour the chocolate pudding mixture into popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen. If you don't have popsicle molds, you can pour the mixture into plastic cups instead and use lollipop sticks as handles.

steps.headline: Place the milk and Nutella in a saucepan.
steps.description:
Heat the milk and Nutella over a low heat, stirring all the time. When the Nutella has melted, take the saucepan off the heat and allow to cool slightly. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/aid3858724-v4-728px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Pour into popsicle molds.
steps.description: Pour the chocolatey milk into the popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen.

methods.name: Making Banana and Avocado Based Chocolate Popsicles

steps.headline: Blend all of the ingredients together.
steps.description:
Place the avocado flesh, banana, Greek yogurt, cocoa powder, white sugar and vanilla essence in a blender and whizz together until the mixture achieves a smooth consistency, with no lumps or bumps. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/51\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/5\/51\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/aid3858724-v4-728px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Pour into popsicle molds.
steps.description: Pour the mixture into popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen - approximately four hours or overnight.

text:
Making Simple Chocolate Popsicles Combine all of the ingredients in a large bowl. Combine the package of instant chocolate pudding mix with the milk and white sugar in a large bowl. Mix with a wire whisk until you achieve a smooth consistency. Pour into popsicle molds. Pour the chocolate pudding mixture into popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen. If you don't have popsicle molds, you can pour the mixture into plastic cups instead and use lollipop sticks as handles. Making Nutella Popsicles Place the milk and Nutella in a saucepan. Heat the milk and Nutella over a low heat, stirring all the time. When the Nutella has melted, take the saucepan off the heat and allow to cool slightly. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/aid3858724-v4-728px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Pour into popsicle molds. Pour the chocolatey milk into the popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen. Making Banana and Avocado Based Chocolate Popsicles Blend all of the ingredients together. Place the avocado flesh, banana, Greek yogurt, cocoa powder, white sugar and vanilla essence in a blender and whizz together until the mixture achieves a smooth consistency, with no lumps or bumps. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/51\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/5\/51\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/aid3858724-v4-728px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Pour into popsicle molds. Pour the mixture into popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen - approximately four hours or overnight. Finished. Enjoy your Popsicles!
sentences: Making Simple Chocolate Popsicles Combine all of the ingredients in a large bowl.
Combine the package of instant chocolate pudding mix with the milk and white sugar in a large bowl.
Mix with a wire whisk until you achieve a smooth consistency.
Pour the chocolate pudding mixture into popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen.
If you don't have popsicle molds, you can pour the mixture into plastic cups instead and use lollipop sticks as handles.
Making Nutella Popsicles Place the milk and Nutella in a saucepan.
Heat the milk and Nutella over a low heat, stirring all the time.
When the Nutella has melted, take the saucepan off the heat and allow to cool slightly.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/aid3858724-v4-728px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Pour into popsicle molds.
Pour the chocolatey milk into the popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen.
Making Banana and Avocado Based Chocolate Popsicles Blend all of the ingredients together.
Place the avocado flesh, banana, Greek yogurt, cocoa powder, white sugar and vanilla essence in a blender and whizz together until the mixture achieves a smooth consistency, with no lumps or bumps.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/51\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/5\/51\/Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/aid3858724-v4-728px-Make-Chocolate-Popsicles-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Pour into popsicle molds.
Pour the mixture into popsicle molds and place in the freezer until frozen - approximately four hours or overnight.
